name: Beyond the Labyrinth
description:
Beyond the Labyrinth is a RPG game developed by Tri-Ace. It came out on 19-01-2012. It was published by Konami. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Beyond the Labyrinth is available on Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Shingo Mukaitouge. It was directed by Takayuki Suguro. It was scored by Motoi Sakuraba.
